books.author: by David Sedaris
books.description: Essays from the humorist on subjects like French dentistry and a North Carolina Costco and his father’s dinner attire.
books.name: LET'S EXPLORE DIABETES WITH OWLS

books.author: by Sheryl Sandberg with Nell Scovell
books.description: The chief operating officer of Facebook urges women to pursue their careers without ambivalence and to cultivate a will to lead.
books.name: LEAN IN

books.author: by Eben Alexander
books.description: A neurosurgeon recounts his near death experience during a coma from bacterial meningitis.
books.name: PROOF OF HEAVEN

books.author: by Michael Pollan
books.description: The writer masters recipes and argues that regaining control of cooking will make Americans healthier.
books.name: COOKED

books.author: by Susannah Cahalan
books.description: A medical mystery in which doctors struggle to discover why a young reporter suddenly experiences seizures, hallucinations and eventually near catatonia.
books.name: BRAIN ON FIRE

books.author: by Michael Ritland with Gary Brozek
books.description: A former member of the Navy SEALs describes his subsequent career finding, training and supplying working dogs to the U.S. military.
books.name: TRIDENT K9 WARRIORS

books.author: by Cheryl Strayed
books.description: A woman’s account of a life-changing 1,100-mile hike along the Pacific Crest Trail during the summer of 1995.
books.name: WILD

books.author: by Crystal McVea
books.description: An account of what happened to a teacher from Oklahoma, formerly a religious skeptic, during nine minutes of unconsciousness.
books.name: WAKING UP IN HEAVEN

books.author: by Jeremy Scahill
books.description: An account of America’s new covert wars, fought by secret commandos.
books.name: DIRTY WARS

books.author: by Eric Schmidt and Jared Cohen
books.description: The promise and peril of the continuing information and technology revolution for people, nations and business.
books.name: THE NEW DIGITAL AGE

books.author: by Carol Burnett
books.description: The comedian recalls her oldest daughter, who died in 2002.
books.name: CARRIE AND ME

books.author: by Chris Kyle with Scott McEwen and Jim DeFelice
books.description: A member of the Navy SEALs who had the most career sniper kills in United States military history discusses his childhood, his marriage and his battlefield experiences during the Iraq war. Kyle was recently shot to death in Texas.
books.name: AMERICAN SNIPER

books.author: by Brian Stelter
books.description: A look at the most competitive time slot in television, complete with Machiavellian booking wars and manic behavior by the producers, executives, and stars.
books.name: TOP OF THE MORNING

books.author: by Jackie Hance with Janice Kaplan
books.description: The experience of a mother whose three daughters were killed when her sister-in-law drove the wrong way down the Taconic Parkway.
books.name: I'LL SEE YOU AGAIN

books.author: by Bill O'Reilly and Martin Dugard
books.description: The host of “The O’Reilly Factor” recounts the assassination of John F. Kennedy, a tragedy that has left a lasting imprint on the nation.
books.name: KILLING KENNEDY
